statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;

SELECT location_id, AVG(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id;

SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;

SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-15';
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100;

SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005' GROUP BY device_id
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND location_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174006'
SELECT device_id, MIN(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174007' GROUP BY device_id

SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE location_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174012'

SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174014' AND location_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174015'
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND location_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174016'
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174017' AND energy_consumed > 50
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' AND location_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174018'
SELECT location_id, MAX(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE location_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174019'
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id=1;
SELECT date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionTrends WHERE trend_id=1;
SELECT trend_name FROM EnergyConsumptionTrends WHERE trend_id=2;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE date='2022-01-01' AND time>'12:00:00';
SELECT id, date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM EnergyConsumptionTrends;
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id=3;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE date='2022-01-01' AND time BETWEEN '10:00:00' AND '14:00:00';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionTrends WHERE trend_name LIKE '%efficiency%';
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT trend_name, LENGTH(trend_description) AS description_length FROM EnergyConsumptionTrends;
SELECT MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE date='2022-01-01' OR energy_consumed<50;
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT DISTINCT trend_id, trend_name FROM EnergyConsumptionTrends;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT MIN(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT id, date, time FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed < 50 OR energy_consumed > 100
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE date = '2022-02-15' AND time > '12:00:00'
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM EnergyConsumptionTrends
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN EnergyConsumptionTrends ON EnergyConsumptionData.id = EnergyConsumptionTrends.trend_id
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM EnergyConsumptionData)
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id = (SELECT MIN(id) FROM EnergyConsumptionData)
SELECT id, SUM(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY id
SELECT trend_id, COUNT(*) FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY trend_id
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS average_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM EnergyConsumptionData JOIN EnergyConsumptionTrends ON EnergyConsumptionData.id = EnergyConsumptionTrends.trend_id GROUP BY trend_name
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id = 1 UNION SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id = 2
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, date, consumption FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM energy_consumption_patterns;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM energy_consumption_trends;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Daily';
SELECT id, trend_name, start_date, end_date, trend_type FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, date, consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE description LIKE '%efficient%';
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%solar%';
SELECT id, date, consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE start_date <= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY consumption DESC;
SELECT id, trend_name, start_date, end_date, trend_type FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE start_date >= '2022-07-01' AND end_date <= '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_patterns ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;
SELECT id, pattern_name FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE pattern_name = 'Renewable Energy';
SELECT id, trend_name, start_date, end_date, trend_type FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Seasonal';
SELECT id, date, time, consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date, trend_type FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Yearly'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_consumption_patterns ON energy_consumption_data.id = energy_consumption_patterns.id
SELECT id, pattern_name FROM energy_consumption_patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC
SELECT AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY date
SELECT pattern_name, COUNT(id) AS count FROM energy_consumption_patterns GROUP BY pattern_name
SELECT trend_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS trend_duration FROM energy_consumption_trends
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE description LIKE '%efficient%'
SELECT AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption, MONTH(date) AS month FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY month
SELECT trend_name, trend_type FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2020-12-31'
SELECT trend_name, CONCAT(trend_name, ' (', trend_type, ')') AS trend_details FROM energy_consumption_trends
SELECT MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT id, pattern_name FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE LENGTH(pattern_name) > 10
SELECT trend_name, YEAR(start_date) AS start_year, YEAR(end_date) AS end_year FROM energy_consumption_trends
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM energy_consumption_patterns)
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption_data UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id) FROM energy_consumption_patterns
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT trend_type, COUNT(id) AS trend_count FROM energy_consumption_trends GROUP BY trend_type HAVING trend_count > 1
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM energy_consumption_patterns ORDER BY description
SELECT AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption, YEAR(date) AS year FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY year
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT id, timestamp, consumption_kwh FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT city, country FROM Locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE location_id=1;
SELECT * FROM Patterns;
SELECT pattern_description FROM Patterns WHERE pattern_id=2;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE id=100;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE name='John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%weather%';
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE city='London';
SELECT city, country FROM Locations WHERE country='Canada';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Patterns WHERE pattern_id=3;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location='Paris' AND consumption_kwh > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%energy%';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id=10;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE city='Berlin';
SELECT id, location, consumption_kwh FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_kwh > 100
SELECT DISTINCT city, country FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM Locations WHERE country = 'USA')
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ec JOIN Locations l ON ec.location = l.city WHERE ec.consumption_kwh > 200
SELECT SUM(consumption_kwh) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location = 'London'
SELECT ec.id, ec.timestamp, l.city, l.country FROM EnergyConsumption ec JOIN Locations l ON ec.location = l.city WHERE ec.consumption_kwh BETWEEN 100 AND 500
SELECT c.name, c.email, l.city, l.country FROM Customers c JOIN Locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.country = 'Canada'
SELECT pattern_description FROM Patterns WHERE pattern_id = 1
SELECT AVG(consumption_kwh) AS avg_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY location HAVING avg_consumption > 150
SELECT ec.timestamp, c.name, c.email FROM EnergyConsumption ec JOIN Customers c ON ec.location = (SELECT city FROM Locations WHERE location_id = c.location_id) WHERE c.name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT MAX(consumption_kwh) AS max_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location = 'Berlin'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT c.name, COUNT(ec.id) AS num_consumptions FROM Customers c JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON c.location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM Locations WHERE city = 'Paris') GROUP BY c.name

SELECT ec.timestamp, c.name, c.email, l.city FROM EnergyConsumption ec JOIN Customers c ON ec.location = (SELECT city FROM Locations WHERE location_id = c.location_id) JOIN Locations l ON ec.location = l.city WHERE ec.consumption_kwh > 300
SELECT p.pattern_description, COUNT(ec.id) AS num_consumptions FROM Patterns p JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON p.pattern_id = ec.id GROUP BY p.pattern_description

SELECT ec.id, ec.timestamp, c.name, c.email, l.city, l.country FROM EnergyConsumption ec JOIN Customers c ON ec.location = (SELECT city FROM Locations WHERE location_id = c.location_id) JOIN Locations l ON ec.location = l.city WHERE ec.consumption_kwh < 50

SELECT c.name, COUNT(*) AS num_consumptions FROM Customers c JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON c.location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM Locations WHERE country = 'Germany') WHERE ec.consumption_kwh < 100 GROUP BY c.name

SELECT ec.timestamp, c.name, c.email FROM EnergyConsumption ec JOIN Customers c ON ec.location = (SELECT city FROM Locations WHERE location_id = c.location_id) WHERE ec.consumption_kwh > (SELECT AVG(consumption_kwh) FROM EnergyConsumption)
SELECT pattern_description, COUNT(ec.id) AS num_consumptions FROM Patterns JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON pattern_id = ec.id GROUP BY pattern_description HAVING COUNT(ec.id) > 10

SELECT c.name, l.city, SUM(ec.consumption_kwh) AS total_consumption FROM Customers c JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON c.location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM Locations WHERE city = l.city) JOIN Locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id GROUP BY c.name, l.city HAVING total_consumption > 500
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_id, consumption_value FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM energy_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM energy_devices;
SELECT * FROM energy_locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM energy_locations;
SELECT location_name, region FROM energy_locations;
SELECT * FROM energy_users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM energy_users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM energy_users;
SELECT * FROM energy_analysis;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type FROM energy_analysis;
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM energy_analysis;
SELECT ec.device_id, ec.timestamp, ed.device_name FROM energy_consumption_data ec INNER JOIN energy_devices ed ON ec.device_id = ed.device_id;
SELECT eu.user_name, el.location_name, ea.analysis_type FROM energy_users eu JOIN energy_locations el ON eu.user_id = el.location_id JOIN energy_analysis ea ON el.location_id = ea.analysis_id;
SELECT ec.device_id, ed.device_name, ea.analysis_type FROM energy_consumption_data ec JOIN energy_devices ed ON ec.device_id = ed.device_id CROSS JOIN energy_analysis ea;
SELECT ed.device_name, COUNT(ec.timestamp) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption_data ec JOIN energy_devices ed ON ec.device_id = ed.device_id GROUP BY ed.device_name;
SELECT el.location_name, SUM(ec.consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data ec JOIN energy_locations el ON ec.device_id = el.location_id GROUP BY el.location_name;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_name, consumption_value FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id;
SELECT location_name, region, user_name FROM energy_locations JOIN energy_users ON energy_locations.location_id = energy_users.user_id;
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM energy_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 456;
SELECT device_name, AVG(consumption_value) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, MAX(consumption_value) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, MIN(consumption_value) AS min_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_users ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY user_name;

SELECT device_name, region, AVG(consumption_value) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id JOIN energy_locations ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_locations.location_id GROUP BY device_name, region;

SELECT user_name, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY user_name;

SELECT device_name, region, MAX(consumption_value) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id JOIN energy_locations ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_locations.location_id GROUP BY device_name, region;

SELECT device_name, region, MIN(consumption_value) AS min_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id JOIN energy_locations ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_locations.location_id GROUP BY device_name, region;

SELECT location_name, user_name, AVG(consumption_value) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_locations ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_locations.location_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_locations.location_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY location_name, user_name;

SELECT location_name, user_name, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_locations ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_locations.location_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_locations.location_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY location_name, user_name;

SELECT location_name, user_name, MAX(consumption_value) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_locations ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_locations.location_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_locations.location_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY location_name, user_name;

SELECT location_name, user_name, MIN(consumption_value) AS min_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_locations ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_locations.location_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_locations.location_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY location_name, user_name;

SELECT device_name, user_name, AVG(consumption_value) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY device_name, user_name;

SELECT device_name, user_name, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY device_name, user_name;

SELECT device_name, user_name, MAX(consumption_value) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY device_name, user_name;

SELECT device_name, user_name, MIN(consumption_value) AS min_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_devices ON energy_consumption_data.device_id = energy_devices.device_id JOIN energy_users ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_users.user_id GROUP BY device_name, user_name;
